trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs> class supplies values to the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event handler.
You create a <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event handler to select the role provider at run time.

The <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> class raises the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event when either the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.IsCurrentUserInRole%2A> method or the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.GetRolesForCurrentUser%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> class is called.
You use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.User%2A> property to retrieve information about the logged-in user.

To retrieve role information through a non-default role provider, set the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.ProviderName%2A> property to the name of the role provider that you want the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService> object to use.
Gets or sets the role provider to use for retrieving the user's roles.

You use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.ProviderName%2A> property to set the role provider during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event.
The name of the role provider that is used to get the user's roles.

You use the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.SelectingProviderEventArgs.User%2A> property to retrieve information about the user during the <xref:System.Web.ApplicationServices.RoleService.SelectingProvider> event.
An object that contains the authenticated user.
